comments:
1. Have a project in the PHP Explorer view
2. Import the file debug.php(attached)to the project
3. Run the file as PHP Script
4. Go to Window > Preferences > PHP > PHP Interpreter
5. Switch the PHP Version to PHP 4
6. Press Apply and OK buttons
7. PHP Settings Changed dialog is opened, press Yes

The result: An error is loged

note: as many times we switch between PHP4 and PHP5 as many errors we receive

--log:
